com.google.android.exoplayer

Class SampleHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.SampleHolder

  • public final class SampleHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds sample data and corresponding metadata.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean allowDataBufferReplacement
      Whether a SampleSource is permitted to replace data if its current value is null or of insufficient size to hold the sample.
      CryptoInfo cryptoInfo 
      java.nio.ByteBuffer data
      A buffer holding the sample data.
      boolean decodeOnly
      If true then the sample should be decoded, but should not be presented.
      int flags
      Flags that accompany the sample.
      int size
      The size of the sample in bytes.
      long timeUs
      The time at which the sample should be presented.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SampleHolder(boolean allowDataBufferReplacement) 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • allowDataBufferReplacement

        public final boolean allowDataBufferReplacement
        Whether a SampleSource is permitted to replace data if its current value is null or of insufficient size to hold the sample.

      • cryptoInfo

        public final CryptoInfo cryptoInfo

      • data

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer data
        A buffer holding the sample data.

      • size

        public int size
        The size of the sample in bytes.

      • flags

        public int flags
        Flags that accompany the sample. A combination of android.media.MediaExtractor#SAMPLE_FLAG_SYNC and android.media.MediaExtractor#SAMPLE_FLAG_ENCRYPTED

      • timeUs

        public long timeUs
        The time at which the sample should be presented.

      • decodeOnly

        public boolean decodeOnly
        If true then the sample should be decoded, but should not be presented.
